Review Text: not worth the headache if you NEED something reliable. never had an issue up until last week. i’ve been using them for months with the blink plus subscription plan that i pay for monthly. well last week while i was on vacation they cut out. the app said i didn’t have a blink subscription plan, which i did and do. and confirmed i do, also verified the charge was taken from my account. for whatever reason no one seems to have reasoning for what happened and all the footage is lost now. yes i have it back up and working but i guess my main concern was the reliability. other than that i thoroughly enjoy the cameras and they do exactly what i need. unfortunately some sort of technical issues that can not be explained occurred.. idk. just warning to anyone who needs something reliable.

Review Text: I am disappointed that the blink doesn’t come with software to record security video to your pc hard drive. I prefer to look at the security video on my hard drive and not have a subscription where my security video is store on someone else’s hard drive in the could where it is not secure. Review Title: Quality has dropped recently. They are basically shipping toy cameras now.
Review Text: Not my first time purchasing a Blink camera. But it will be my last. I ordered a two-pack and one was just a brick - wouldn't work at all, and the other had such a skewed/stretched/distorted view once it was hooked up and working that I think there must have been a manufacturing defect in the lens. Housing quality is much thinner and cheaper plastic than earlier versions. These new cameras do not come with any remote storage like they used to (Amazon getting greedy). They are not sturdy at all. If you place one in a certain position, within minutes gravity will take over and move the position of the camera until it is pointing down in about 5 minutes. Also, with the app there is no way to view a camera continuously for more than 30 seconds at a time. That is a terrible oversight. I know Amazon is pushing these very cheaply, but you really get even less than you pay for here. I don't recommend these at all.

Review Title: Don't buy for a baby monitor!
Review Text: If you're purchasing this for a baby monitor,  don't buy this product.A huge limitation is that the live feed times out after 30 seconds and the feed stops unless you hit the continue button, even though the product is plugged directly into the wall. Unless Blink comes up with a huge update,  there's no setting to change the 30 sec timeout.The quality and sensitivity as well as night vision are fantastic.  This would be a great indoor surveillance camera for motion detection.
Review posted time: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021

Review Text: Had only for 4 months then stopped working. Called customer service 3 times and were told it’s my firewall and to contact my internet provider, that wasn’t the problem, then told to disconnect and reset the units,  delete and reinstall the app, reset my router, to finally it’s their server issue. Apparently their server is down for an entire day and counting... Very disappointing!UPDATE: A Blink representative reached out to me and resolved all issues. I was surprised and pleased by that. Both cameras seem to be working fine again. I didn’t have to do anything on my end, just happy it’s been resolved on theirs.

Review Title: Good considering the price - randomly stops recording motion events.
Review Text: Overall, I am happy with its performance considering the price.The picture quality is pretty good - especially in the day.The main issue is that the camera will randomly stop recording motion events despite being in “armed” mode in the app. This is to the point where I will walk by on my way to or from work and it won’t pick up anything.My workaround is to disarm it, take a new picture to base the activity zones on, and then arm it again. This works most of the time.We use this to record the comings and goings on our porch and driveway. We have it pointing out of our large front window.Considering the reasonable price, I’m happy with it. Just wish it wouldn’t randomly stop recording motion events.

You also have to pay $10 a month after your trial ends, to be able to view your cameras. I like the sleek square design and I like that the mini version is plug in and doesn’t require me to waste batteries. It’s a good camera system if you can do without continuous live view or Viewing all your cameras at once. If you’re looking for an indoor camera with CONTINUOUS live view and the ability to watch all of your cameras at the same time, check out the merkury innovations 1080p indoor camera. Review Title: Does not record longer than ten seconds.
Review Text: I was initially excited for this purchase to update our interior camera and add external cameras. Although the cameras are so easy to install and offer you a great picture, I am HIGHLY disappointed in their recording features. The cameras can only record a maximum of 10 seconds clips of the initial motion. Then, they shut off for a few seconds, and if motion is detected, start up again, only to record another 10 second clip. This causes bits and, sometimes crucial pieces of what you were trying to record, to be missing. Terrible. The cameras only record if they are “armed.” And you have to scroll through ALL of the individual clips to maybe find what you’re looking for.My last camera system, similarly priced and about the same price per month, would record continuously and give you time stamps of the entire motion on a timeline- allowing you to catch what happened. AND they rotated. I primarily use the camera to monitor my dog, however we recently had a baby and there was an incident where he was injured and nobody could tell me what happened and went to check the cameras, and what do you know.? They were disarmed.Highly dissatisfied and disappointed with the features and just want back my old cameras.
Review posted time: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2021

Review Title: Decent but noisy and no continuous view
Review Text: This camera is decent for the price when it comes to image quality, a compact size that can be placed easily in many types of spaces, and the customization to set motion sensing zones and a schedule for when to sense motion and not to. $35 is hard to beat. BUT…The camera is noisy and emits an audible click when the motion sensor is tripped or a viewer activates the live view from Alexa or via the Blink app. Why not use a software based system to “mute” the camera?And as other reviewers have mentioned, it lacks the ability to be continuously viewed. It prompts you after 30 seconds to continue viewing. Often times we want to use the camera to monitor for a while and not just “pop in” and then exit the app.I would like to purchase a few more similar sized and featured cameras but will wait before buying another one of these Blink cameras.
Review posted time: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021

Review Title: Item defective - went through two cameras
Review Text: I wanted to like this camera, but it caused me several issues and seems to be defective. I bought one of these cameras, and after only a few uses, the camera started to leak a strange liquid when it was plugged in. I told Amazon customer support, and they gave me a refund and told me to dispose of the camera.A few weeks later, I ordered this camera again, since I figured this was a one-time issue and I would not have the same problem with this camera. I wasn't using this camera 24/7; I would plug it in occasionally to monitor my pets. After only a few uses, the camera suddenly stopped working and would not turn on. I messaged customer service again, only to be told that the return window had passed and there was nothing they could do. Very disappointed with my experience with this camera - I wanted to like it, but this product seems to be defective and short-lived.

Review Title: Does NOT work the way it should without a subscription
Review Text: I had to purchase a few of these cameras in order to ensure the security of my home. I did not have a problem purchasing the module and the accessories needed to make the units function as a whole. Everything was perfect once I installed everything and started using the system (during the subscription free trial). Once the free trial expired everything went to heck. Clips stopped being recorded and overall USB functionality went to crap. The cameras constantly lose connection and fail to record important clips. I personally do not want security footage of the inside of my home stored in the cloud, hence the reason I do not want a cloud subscription. Therefore, I do not recommend the purchase of this product unless you intend to pay the monthly fee to have your videos saved on some server that any decent hacker can access.

Review Title: Blink knowingly shipping cameras that don't work.
Review Text: Extremely disappointed in the Blink Mini.  The motion sensor doesn't work correctly right out of the box. After searching Blink's website for answers I found they are aware of a firmware issue and are working on a fix. However, the issue has been known for months and no expected repair date was given.  I think it's terrible that Blink an Amazon company would sell customers a product they know isn't going to work as advertised. The Blink Mini should be pulled from the market until it has been fixed.Update I am changing my reviews to 4 stars. The camera still doesn't work as intended and I do think Blink should stop selling these until there is a fix. However Blink's costumer support has been excellent in responding to the issue. They did acknowledge there is an issue they are working and offered to send us a different model at no charges to make up for our problems. So customer support earned Blink 3 more stars from me. I would now recommend  buying from Blink.

Review Title: subscription concern resolved with local storage

Haitham from Blink customer service reached out and walked me thru the capabilities of the Blink Sync Module which provides me the functionality that I need (real time access to recordings via the app) without a monthly charge.  He was very helpful in describing the benefits and limitations of both the subscription model and local storage.  I greatly appreciated the outreach and am able to access all of the functions that I need with the addition of a sync module.

Review Text: ***DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT*** if you plan to use this camera to record detected motion or send motion notifications. After purchasing two blink minis I soon discovered a defect. After going into IR/night vision mode, the cameras motion detection “freezes” causing the motion detection/recording/auto alert notifications not to work at all, rendering that camera completely useless. You then have to physically get into your app to unfreeze your camera. Thinking that maybe my two cameras were just a fluke defect that slipped through, I performed a simple internet search only to discover that this is a major known defect that affects ALL Blink Mini Cameras. Apparently Blink techs have been working for quite some time trying to fix this defect. It is beyond me why Amazon is still actively selling a known defective product. Mine are being returned.

Review Text: I have 5 of these cameras, set up was easy, picture quality was good and worked as expected for a while. This did the trick for a couple of days. Starting picking up everything. 20 to 30 videos of flies, moths, light movements and sometimes with no movement at all.  Now passed 3 camera on the way out of house and no recordings from any camera.  Stood right in front of camera from 10 inched to 10 feet and nothing.Very unreliable.  Will be returning and looking for something that works all the time.

Review Title: Reasonable for the price, yet impractical for surveillance.
Review Text: I give the Blink Camera a 2 out of 5 stars because of it's function. 1. It does not have the capability to have a continuous monitoring or recording system. You have to manually interact every minute to watch the live stream. 2. What is the point of motion detection if you get a late response from the detection. You will be missing out of the first 30 seconds of what it detected. 3. The videos recorded are a maximun lengh of 1 minute. If a theif or something was to occur the video would have stopped recording by then after 1 minute. So you will be left in the dark.
Review posted time: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2021

Review Title: great little camera that does everything we needed it to.
Review Text: Great product. I love the talk back feature. Its almost an essential part of the school room we made up in our finished attic. If I need to go switch laundry or make lunch I can check in on the kids or help them with a question while I finish up my task. Works great with the app and other blink cameras we have. We use this one often so I'm glad its a plug in to not use up batteries to quickly.
Review posted time: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2020

Review Text: Was looking to get another Amazon cloud cam and found they were replaced with the blink cameras. Not only does it require a subscription to record anything at all, the features are limited and the app to control it is archaic looking. This was not built with the customer in mind. Seriously what’s the point of a camera that won’t record anything unless you pay them money? “Yes officer, I have a camera that showed the crime clearly with their faces, but my camera won’t save anything unless I pay more.”
Review posted time: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021

Review Title: Keeps making a loud clicking noise
Review Text: I order the Blink camera knowing that there isn’t a constant live stream but still to use for watching my kids during nap while I work downstairs. Then when I do turn on the live stream to check on them I keep hearing a clicking noise. The noise is so constant and loud it causes my kids to wake. I question, if this camera was used for security, how the noise would not set people off. My Blink is brand new(received on 6/24), and always plugged in with a USB so no battery issues. I was very excited to receive this camera and possibly ordering more. I do not see myself ordering more if this is a issue with the product.

Review Title: The issue isn't the device...its the app.
Review Text: The picture quality is good.  The night vision is good.  The cost is good.  The app is only OK.  Specifically, when the motion detection triggers a recording, the maximum length of time you can set it to record is 30 seconds.  Then it waits 10 seconds before resetting the motion detection settings.  If the motion continues it will record again for another 30 seconds.  All of this leaves 10 second gaps in the video if you are trying to capture nefarious activity.I was hoping the AC powered version would overcome this issue, but it doesn't.

Review Text: Not impressed. Was expecting a much better product. The motion detection has a pretty big delay so you miss out on a lot of what's going on. I bought it to monitor my kids rooms and I definitely wouldn't reccomend it for a baby monitor. I can hardly see my kids too when they're not 2 feet in front of the camera. On the way to return them

Review Text: The camera itself is okay for the money. The night vision is ok, the quality is ok and it’s easy to configure. The big problem is the software. The app itself is littered with problems and the camera goes offline for no reason constantly. Save yourself some money and frustration and get a different brand
